01875 llvm::Instruction *
01876 FunctionEmitContext::CallInst(llvm::Function *func, llvm::Value *arg0,
01877                               llvm::Value *arg1, const char *name) {
01878     if (func == NULL || arg0 == NULL || arg1 == NULL) {
01879         assert(m->errorCount > 0);
01880         return NULL;
01881     }
01882 
01883     llvm::Value *args[] = { arg0, arg1 };
01884 #if defined(LLVM_3_0) || defined(LLVM_3_0svn)
01885     llvm::ArrayRef<llvm::Value *> argArrayRef(&args[0], &args[2]);
01886     llvm::Instruction *ci = 
01887         llvm::CallInst::Create(func, argArrayRef, name ? name : "", 
01888                                bblock);
01889 #else
01890     llvm::Instruction *ci = 
01891         llvm::CallInst::Create(func, &args[0], &args[2], name ? name : "", 
01892                                bblock);
01893 #endif
01894     AddDebugPos(ci);
01895     return ci;
01896 }
01897 
01898 
01899 llvm::Instruction *
01900 FunctionEmitContext::ReturnInst() {
01901     if (launchedTasks)
01902         // Add a sync call at the end of any function that launched tasks
01903         SyncInst();
01904 
01905     llvm::Instruction *rinst = NULL;
01906     if (returnValuePtr != NULL) {
01907         // We have value(s) to return; load them from their storage
01908         // location
01909         llvm::Value *retVal = LoadInst(returnValuePtr, returnType,
01910                                        "return_value");
01911         rinst = llvm::ReturnInst::Create(*g->ctx, retVal, bblock);
01912     }
01913     else {
01914         assert(returnType == AtomicType::Void);
01915         rinst = llvm::ReturnInst::Create(*g->ctx, bblock);
01916     }
01917 
01918     AddDebugPos(rinst);
01919     bblock = NULL;
01920     return rinst;
01921 }
01922 
01923 
01924 llvm::Instruction *
01925 FunctionEmitContext::LaunchInst(llvm::Function *callee, 
01926                                 std::vector<llvm::Value *> &argVals,
01927                                 llvm::Value *launchCount) {
01928     if (callee == NULL) {
01929         assert(m->errorCount > 0);
01930         return NULL;
01931     }
01932 
01933     launchedTasks = true;
01934 
01935     LLVM_TYPE_CONST llvm::Type *argType = callee->arg_begin()->getType();
01936     assert(llvm::PointerType::classof(argType));
01937     LLVM_TYPE_CONST llvm::PointerType *pt = 
01938         llvm::dyn_cast<LLVM_TYPE_CONST llvm::PointerType>(argType);
01939     assert(llvm::StructType::classof(pt->getElementType()));
01940     LLVM_TYPE_CONST llvm::StructType *argStructType = 
01941         static_cast<LLVM_TYPE_CONST llvm::StructType *>(pt->getElementType());
01942     assert(argStructType->getNumElements() == argVals.size() + 1);
01943 
01944     llvm::Function *falloc = m->module->getFunction("ISPCAlloc");
01945     assert(falloc != NULL);
01946     int align = 4 * RoundUpPow2(g->target.nativeVectorWidth);
01947     std::vector<llvm::Value *> allocArgs;
01948     allocArgs.push_back(launchGroupHandlePtr);
01949     allocArgs.push_back(SizeOf(argStructType));
01950     allocArgs.push_back(LLVMInt32(align));
01951     llvm::Value *voidmem = CallInst(falloc, allocArgs, "args_ptr");
01952     llvm::Value *argmem = BitCastInst(voidmem, pt);
01953 
01954     // Copy the values of the parameters into the appropriate place in
01955     // the argument block
01956     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < argVals.size(); ++i) {
01957         llvm::Value *ptr = GetElementPtrInst(argmem, 0, i, "funarg");
01958         // don't need to do masked store here, I think
01959         StoreInst(argVals[i], ptr);
01960     }
01961 
01962     // copy in the mask
01963     llvm::Value *mask = GetMask();
01964     llvm::Value *ptr = GetElementPtrInst(argmem, 0, argVals.size(),
01965                                          "funarg_mask");
01966     StoreInst(mask, ptr);
01967 
01968     // And emit the call to the user-supplied task launch function, passing
01969     // a pointer to the task function being called and a pointer to the
01970     // argument block we just filled in
01971     llvm::Value *fptr = BitCastInst(callee, LLVMTypes::VoidPointerType);
01972     llvm::Function *flaunch = m->module->getFunction("ISPCLaunch");
01973     assert(flaunch != NULL);
01974     std::vector<llvm::Value *> args;
01975     args.push_back(launchGroupHandlePtr);
01976     args.push_back(fptr);
01977     args.push_back(voidmem);
01978     args.push_back(launchCount);
01979     return CallInst(flaunch, args, "");
01980 }
01981 
01982 
01983 void
01984 FunctionEmitContext::SyncInst() {
01985     llvm::Value *launchGroupHandle = LoadInst(launchGroupHandlePtr, NULL);
01986     llvm::Value *nullPtrValue = llvm::Constant::getNullValue(LLVMTypes::VoidPointerType);
01987     llvm::Value *nonNull = CmpInst(llvm::Instruction::ICmp,
01988                                    llvm::CmpInst::ICMP_NE,
01989                                    launchGroupHandle, nullPtrValue);
01990     llvm::BasicBlock *bSync = CreateBasicBlock("call_sync");
01991     llvm::BasicBlock *bPostSync = CreateBasicBlock("post_sync");
01992     BranchInst(bSync, bPostSync, nonNull);
01993 
01994     SetCurrentBasicBlock(bSync);
01995     llvm::Function *fsync = m->module->getFunction("ISPCSync");
01996     if (fsync == NULL)
01997         FATAL("Couldn't find ISPCSync declaration?!");
01998     CallInst(fsync, launchGroupHandle, "");
01999     BranchInst(bPostSync);
02000 
02001     SetCurrentBasicBlock(bPostSync);
02002 }
